abstract: the only basic steel-cut oats recipe you 'll ever need .
article: yields : serves 4 active time time : 2 minutes total time time : 22 minutes nutrition calories 210 fat 5g satfat 1.5 g monofat 1.5 g polyfat 1.0 g protein 8g carbohydrates 32g fiber 5g sugars 6g added sugars 3g sodium 150 mg calcium 8 % dv potassium 4 % dv ingredients 1 cup steel-cut oats 1 cup milk 2 cups water 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon 2 teaspoons honey desired toppings directions combine oats , milk , water , salt , and cinnamon in a medium saucepan . bring to a boil , then reduce heat to low .

simmer uncovered for 15 to 20 minutes until desired thickness , stirring occasionally . remove from heat and let cool slightly . divide equally between four bowls . drizzle each serving with 1/2 teaspoon honey . add additional desired toppings and serve . cook 's notes : we used whole milk in our recipe . for dairy-free oatmeal , substitute your favorite nut milk .
